profiledesc.creation: Finding aid created with EADitor by user npkmc.
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: Annia Booth was 21 years old in 1904 and living in New York City. She had left home in July 1903. This journal starts about six months later in January 1904. Annia Booth’s journal documents her daily life in New York City at the age of 21. There are descriptions of where she went every day including what she had for meals. She lists what she bought each week and notes the dates members of her family died.

accessrestrict.p: The items in folders one through ten have no restrictions. All items in folder Eleven: Research Materials and Secondary Sources, have copyrights retained by the original authors or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law http://www.loc.gov/copyright/title17/.

bioghist.p: Annia Booth was 21 years old in 1904 and living in New York City. She had left home in July 1903. This journal starts about six months later in January 1904.

scopecontent.p: The Annia F. Booth Papers consists of the journal of Annia Booth written in the years 1904 through 1905.

userestrict.p: The items in folders one through ten have no restrictions. All items in folder Eleven: Research Materials and Secondary Sources, have copyrights retained by the original authors or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law http://www.loc.gov/copyright/title17/.
